NUMBER_OF_PLAYERS_TO_WAIT_FOR_MESSAGE: 需要等待玩家的數量（包括你自己！）
ILLEGAL_MESSAGE: Illegal game found. Please buy, install the game and launch at least once.
RAID_PLAYER_EXTRACTED: You have extracted! Please wait for the game to end or quit now using the F8 Key.
RAID_PLAYER_EXTRACTED_HOST: You have extracted! Please wait for all players to extract or quit now using the F8 Key.
RAID_PLAYER_DEAD: You are Dead! Please wait for the game to end or quit now using the F8 Key.
RAID_TEAM_EXTRACTED: Your team has extracted! Quit now using the F8 Key.
RAID_TEAM_DEAD: Your team is Dead! Please quit now using the F8 Key.
